title: I have no friends playing league...
body:
... this means i can't play ranked anymore due to the existence of Dynamic Queue.

True story, no hidden sarcasm.

replies.body: I have friends but they are not good enough to premade with them and overcome the handicap Riot gives to premades.

Same. I avoid playing ranked with friends because it would still basically be solo queue. My friends aren't good and we don't use skype and we don't camp each others lanes. So going against people that do ends up in a loss.
ditto
I have friends and DQ is the only thing keeping me remotely in the game. :/

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wW8vGyMh,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-06-12T17:06:51.558+0000)
>
> I have friends and DQ is the only thing keeping me remotely in the game. :/

Play normals, dont bring cancer to ranked pls.

Im in the same elo as my friends and it's the only thing getting us through bronze. I keep them in check when they flame other people and they keep me from getting tilted over someone flaming me. It's a good system, not everyone is cancer

"It's a good system"

Aye, it is. But not for ranked.
in my opinion it is

It probably is in bronze honestly. Being able to play with 5 people your skill level, but with the promise they won't feed or be toxic. Higher up I can see it being horrible, because the sheer communication and synergy would make it impossible to win as a solo player. But it might work in bronze.
Not even just the communication and skill (they kinda suck tbh) just still being able to have fun while ranking up

Thats not really the point of a rank queue though. Ranked is meant to test your communication and skill and while fun is important, it shouldn't take precedent over competitive integrity. Thats what normals are for. 

I get why you prefer DQ for your personal situation but I think you are having a quite narrow view of the effects and are only seeing your side. You have missed the huge negative impact DQ has had on everyone else who is in this system and arent seeing how DQ damages ranking in league as a whole, right from bronze to diamond+

Either that, or you just dont care about everyone else, but you seem like a reasonable person so I dont think thats the case.

I really think RIOT can fix the game and make DQ work. 
I think it's backwards. I see the other side. I see the frustration of fighting 4 mans and having 4 mans on your team, but at the same time i feel like the anti DQ side refuses to even considered that DQ could work, that it is good for *some* people, and that the group of people who like it aren't a minority.
HoTS got rid of it for a reason, Riot should do the same.
Personally I dont see how it can ever work as there is no competitive integrity. But if you have an idea of how DQ can remain a valid competitive ranking system id be willing to listen.

So? Is that relevant? No.

Everyone has an opinion. Just like everyone has a pulse.

My pulse doesn't mean I am right however.
Rito will be delighted about this...except for the fact of course, that many more people LEAVE because of DynQ...

Actually, a lot of people left because Overwatch came out. 

Another thing is nothing is wrong with DQ and it's actually a good thing because no one is gonna be a bitch and be like "I don't play support" because you're given the opportunity to not choose what you don't play. And if you don't play at least two lanes you have no place being in ranked. They left normals and aram the same so people have no reason to bitch seeing riot DID WHAT THE COMMUNITY AS A WHOLE ASKED FOR. 

FUCK PEOPLE NEED TO STOP BEING BITCHY ABOUT DQ.(fake rage)

Another thing, people left because they lost the spark that they loved about league, nothing to do with the game just lost it.
Champion select is not the same as dynamic queue. They are separate systems. You have confused them.
No one on my friends list (not counting my close friends) are quitting from DQ.

Wow, and your list is how many people? A hundred?

Even if it is that many, the number is irrelevant, given the huge numbers we are talking about.

Statistics ftw. Good bye.
Most of my friends barely play LoL anymore. My friend list is mostly empty. The 5-6 that still play are silver anyway so it's not like i can play ranked with them.

You're not required to make or join a premade to play ranked.
Funny story: I had friends playing league but most of them quit because of dynamic queue. And now I pretty much don't have friends to play ranked with.

^ this feels very true sometimes. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
why?

bullshit, while playing ranked can sometimes suck if you're alone it's certainly still possible. Yes, it sucks to be on a team with a 4 man pre-made, but that doesn't happen often and it's totally possible to climb through the ranks anyway. Climbing solo got harder but it's still not impossible.

Thankfully Dynamic is only one way to enjoy the game!

Longing for the laning phase of SR? You can play Blind Pick or Draft and not worry about your LP at all.

Just want to get into a blood bath of exciting team fights? Hop onto the Howling Abyss, where you get to play a random champ from your pool, helping you mix things up. Starting at level 3 with enough gold to buy a BFS, you can expect 10 kills to happen in the first seven minutes!

Seeking a bit more control over your experience, but still eager for a team fight? How about the Twisted Treeline, where supports don't exist and everyone builds tons of damage?

Bored with League in general? Log in on Friday and check out the Rotating Game Mode. Fun and exciting rules changes on various maps, you may even find yourself back on the Crystal Scar!
Somehow I can solo ranked just fine.

Click Play at the top middle of your window > select Ranked > choose a primary and a secondary role > click Enter queue. 

Lane, yell at teammates/get yelled at/teamfight/game ends in 30mins

Understand League is the same as always and life goes on. 


Alternative option:
Hate life like OP
